name: Sheepdog (Joaquín Pino)
description:
Woof, woof! My master told me to keep as many sheep as I can in the areas that he tells me. If I do well, he will give me a cookie. Woof, woof!

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to bark

Credits

  • Freesound and the creators of the sound effects:
    • crazymonke for all barks
    • n_audioman for bleat1.ogg and bleat2.ogg
    • Gitanki for bleat3.ogg
  • FreeSVG for the image of the dog in the menu
  • Mr. 10’s Gaming and Reviews for the mix of Bach’s Brandenburg Concerto No. 4
  • Pablo Impallari for the Dosis font
